channel.title: Desert Treasure; worth 11 prayer?
channel.description: I have a Mage/Meele pure. I was wondering if it would be worth it to do Desrt Treasure, but I hate that you have to do Priest In Peril for 11 prayer. Should I do it for Ice Barrage, or just you entangle/snare?

item.title: Desert Treasure; worth 11 prayer?
item.dc:creator: @not2good not2good
item.description:
@not2good wrote:

Yeah, entangle + zammy flames/sara strike/claws guthix works fine for me. I have a pure with 75 range 77 mage mage and it works fine. I wouldnâ€™t do desert treasure unless I already had 94 mage, like Paul said.

Read full topic

item.title: Desert Treasure; worth 11 prayer?
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

I always thought entangle/snare+zammy flames worked fine, but in my humble opinion 11 prayer is worth it if you already have 94 mage, or enough runes to get there.

Read full topic
